languages.text: {n}Разбитые губы вздрагивают горькой ухмылкой.{/n} "Извини уж, шерин, но не выйдет из этого толку. Я слишком долго была принцессой с жаркой планеты, сладкоязыкой высокородной в глазах бедняжек с Футфола, чтобы вот так просто разбивать вдребезги свой очаровательный образ".

traits.locale_text: {n}Разбитые губы вздрагивают горькой ухмылкой.{/n} "Извини уж, шерин, но не выйдет из этого толку. Я слишком долго была принцессой с жаркой планеты, сладкоязыкой высокородной в глазах бедняжек с Футфола, чтобы вот так просто разбивать в дребезги свой очаровательный образ".

languages.text: {n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."
languages.original_text: {n}Разбитые губы вздрагивают горькой ухмылкой.{/n} "Извини уж, шерин, но не выйдет из этого толку. Я слишком долго была принцессой с жаркой планеты, сладкоязыкой высокородной в глазах бедняжек с Футфола, чтобы вот так просто разбивать вдребезги свой очаровательный образ".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's broken lips shake before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen, this is not going to work. I have been a sweet-spoken highborn princess from a hot planet for too long. Dropping this charming character would be too cruel to the wretches on Footfall."

{n}Jae's broken lips shake before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen, this is not going to work. I have been a sweet-spoken highborn princess from a hot planet for too long. Dropping this charming character would be too cruel to the wretches on Footfall."

{n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."

{n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."

{n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."

languages.text: {n}婕伊的嘴唇颤抖着，露出了苦涩的笑容。{/n}“抱歉，亲爱的，但这恐怕行不通。落脚港所有的可怜虫都知道，我是位甜言蜜语的淑女，来自某颗炎热的行星。我扮演公主的时间实在是太久了，不能就这样让她彻底化为泡影。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的嘴唇颤抖着，露出了苦涩的笑容。{/n}“抱歉，亲爱的，但这恐怕行不通。落脚港所有的可怜虫都知道，我是位甜言蜜语的淑女，来自某颗炎热的行星。我扮演公主的时间实在是太久了，不能就这样让她彻底化为泡影。”

languages.original_text: {n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."

languages.text: {n}El labio partido de Jae tiembla antes de curvarse en una sonrisa amarga.{/n} «Lo siento, shereen, pero eso no va a funcionar. Todos los pobres desgraciados de Paso me conocen como la dama amable del planeta caluroso. He hecho de princesa durante demasiado tiempo como para librarme del papel ahora».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}El labio partido de Jae tiembla antes de curvarse en una sonrisa amarga.{/n} «Lo siento, shereen, pero eso no va a funcionar. Todos los pobres desgraciados de Paso me conocen como la dama amable del planeta caluroso. He hecho de princesa durante demasiado tiempo como para librarme del papel ahora».

languages.text: {n}ジェイは割れた唇を震わせ、苦笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「悪いね。でも、そいつはうまくいかないよ。フットフォールにいる哀れな人たちはみんな、アタシを暑い星から来た優しい女性だと思っている。彼女を粉々に打ち砕くには、アタシはあまりにも長い間プリンセスを演じてきすぎた」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは割れた唇を震わせ、苦笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「悪いね。でも、そいつはうまくいかないよ。フットフォールにいる哀れな人たちはみんな、アタシを暑い星から来た優しい女性だと思っている。彼女を粉々に打ち砕くには、アタシはあまりにも長い間プリンセスを演じてきすぎた」

languages.text: {n}Jaes Lippe zittert kurz, bevor sie sich zu einem verbitterten Lächeln verzieht.{/n} "Tut mir leid, Shereen, doch das wird nicht funktionieren. All die armen Würmer auf Footfall kennen mich als die sanfte Lady von einem heißen Planeten. Ich spiele die Prinzessin schon zu lange, um das jetzt einfach zu zerschmettern."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes Lippe zittert kurz, bevor sie sich zu einem verbitterten Lächeln verzieht.{/n} "Tut mir leid, Shereen, doch das wird nicht funktionieren. All die armen Würmer auf Footfall kennen mich als die sanfte Lady von einem heißen Planeten. Ich spiele die Prinzessin schon zu lange, um das jetzt einfach zu zerschmettern."

languages.text: {n}La lèvre fendue de Jae tremble puis esquisse un sourire amer.{/n} « Navrée, shereen, mais ça ne va pas être possible. Tous les pauvres hères de Castel me connaissent comme cette dame à la langue dorée venue d'une planète aride. J'ai joué les princesses pendant trop longtemps pour mettre ce rôle au placard. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}La lèvre fendue de Jae tremble puis esquisse un sourire amer.{/n} « Navrée, shereen, mais ça ne va pas être possible. Tous les pauvres hères de Castel me connaissent comme cette dame à la langue dorée venue d'une planète aride. J'ai joué les princesses pendant trop longtemps pour mettre ce rôle au placard. »

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın birbirinden ayrılmış dudakları önce seğiriyor, ardından hafif acılı bir gülümseme meydana getiriyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm şirinim ama bu mümkün değil. Binliman'daki tüm garibanlar beni sıcak bir gezegenden gelme, tatlı tatlı konuşan bir hanımefendi olarak biliyor. Prenses rolünü epeydir oynuyorum, durup dururken kesemem."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's split lip trembles before twisting into a bitter smile.{/n} "Sorry, shereen, but that's not going to work. All the poor wretches on Footfall know me as the sweet-spoken lady from a hot planet. I've played the princess for too long to just smash her to pieces."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın birbirinden ayrılmış dudakları önce seğiriyor, ardından hafif acılı bir gülümsemeye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm şirinim ama bu mümkün değil. Binliman'daki tüm garibanlar beni sıcak bir gezegenden gelen, tatlı tatlı konuşan bir hanımefendi olarak biliyor. Prenses rolünü çok uzun süredir oynuyorum, durup dururken paramparça edemem."
